Reviews.Title: “Nice location and good for budget travelers”
Reviews.Author: dyrStr8sfan
Reviews.Content: We stayed at the Hotel Elysee Etoile for 3 nights in June 2011. It is conveniently located near the Arc de Triomphe with plenty of shops and a metro station nearby. The rooms were a little dated, but worked for our travel on a budget. The wireless internet never worked while we were there. The staff were friendly.

Reviews.Title: “An answer to your stay in Paris..”
Reviews.Author: ClaudeDubai
Reviews.Content: I came to Paris during "Le Bourget" with a very late reservation ...every hotel room in Paris seemed to have been reserved or out of my budget and I had no reservation (everything was full) for the Tuesday evening; thanks to Nadia, the lady owner, she managed to arrange a full stay in her hotel, at the very last minute. Hotel itself is very well located to mix business with pleasure (Arc de Triomphe, Champs Elysees are so close, some good restaurants and brasseries very near); air conditioned rooms are quiet and bathrooms are great. Facilities for travellers are close (Air France bus, metro, RER). Thanks to their friendly approach, I keep this hotel has my first choice everytime I am travelling to Paris.

Reviews.Title: “A very good little hotel!”
Reviews.Author: thebossToronto
Reviews.Content: I was a little nervous about staying in a two star hotel because I had only stayed in three and four stars on all my previous visits to Paris. I was not counting on anything too great just well priced and a good location, but I was surprised and delighted with this little gem of a hotel. It was spotlessly clean and tidy, the bathroom was modern, the breakfast, (continental) was inexpensive and good quality. The air conditioning worked brilliantly, housekeeping was excellent during the week, (not as good on the weekends), the Internet worked but needed adjustments regularly, (once or twice a day), but they happily took care of that with a quick phone call from me to the desk downstairs. The minibar in my room did not work at all, I'm not certain if they work in the other rooms, and I was a little disappointed in that but overall I would recommend it and I would not hesitate to stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “Well located!,”
Reviews.Author: Ruleen
Reviews.Content: We stayed at this what we called budget hotel. The rooms are rather small but comfortable. The toilets are very clean and nice, nicer than the room itself. We liked the location of this hotel as it is about 80metres away from the nearest metro- Charles de gulle-etoile. There are also several eateries beside the hotel and s supermarket nearby for us to buy our water from. The rooms have free wifi but the connection tends to be a little on and off sometimes but in the whole, we could still use the wifi when we wanted, so not an issue. The staff were generally friendly as said by previous reviewer except for the lady owner who wasn't too friendly throughout the stay. It could be due to her tone of voice or something. But I think she meant no harm, she is just doing her business. Ha. We encountered an electricity loss on one of the nights and had to walk up the stairs coz the lift was not working and heater and lights on our floor were also not working. On the whole, it was still a pleasant experience and stay.

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel....Great Location”
Reviews.Author: kartik_la
Reviews.Content: We came to Paris end of April. We stayed at this hotel for 4 days with a baby and loved it...The hotel is small but it was no problem. The hotel is ideally located, near all tourist spots....Walkable to Champs Elysees and Arc De Triumph.Good cafe's and restaurants nearby as well....We could take an air France shuttle bus directly from the airport and the stop was very close to the hotel....Karim was a great host.....He was so kind an friendly, he made our stay very memorable... Thanks

Reviews.Title: “Perfect choice in Paris”
Reviews.Author: VictorHCT
Reviews.Content: Last April, me and my family stayed in Hotel Elysee Etoile. It was a perfect choice. It's a small hotel, not to many rooms and its located in a quite calm street, close from subways station (many lines) and monuments like Arc of Triumph. Althought rooms are not too bigl it's not a problem even for a family. We're a group of 4 adults and 1 child and we felt very confortable. Rooms are very clean, and bathroom are modern and perfects. This is the second time I stayed in this hotel and I feel like at home, and to stay in Paris with my family in vacation it's was my first option, because we only need a perfect place to sleep. In the the future, for business or vacation I´m quite sure my option to book in Paris is this Hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Pleasent stay”
Reviews.Author: sukhoi35
Reviews.Content: The hotel is located in one of the best places and has good accessbility. The bathrooms were amazingly clean but the rooms quite small. We came to the room only for sleeping, so size did not matter much for us. Stayed here totally for 2 nights. The male receptionists were very friendly and helpful. The lady at the counter who was present during one of the mornings was not so friendly.

Reviews.Title: “Positively surprising!”
Reviews.Author: Davidshanghai308272
Reviews.Content: I stayed in this hotel for a little less than a week, and had a splendid time... The location is perfect, the service is amazing. I was positively surprised! The room was clean, the bedsheets intact, I must say I will definitely return to that hotel once I'm in Paris again, and I suggest it to everyone!

Reviews.Title: “Perfect Match”
Reviews.Author: gekkog85
Reviews.Content: I come several times a year in Paris for business and i found there the perfect equilibrium. The hotel is really well placed just one avenue away of the Champs Elysees, principal line of subway at only a 100 yards (meters...), bunch of really good restaurants and bars. Rooms are nice and quiet, the guy at the entrance is very helpful, speaks a very good english (not always the case in every parisian hotel !!). So, i would say a perfect match for a quick stay in Paris.

Reviews.Title: “Best value for money in Paris”
Reviews.Author: LudoGi
Reviews.Content: I have to go to Paris 5 or 6 times a year (mostly for business trips). I discovered this place 2 years ago and I still enjoy it! Close to the "Champs Elysees" and to the "Arc de Triomphe", this place is perfect either you are in Paris for a business trip or for holydays. There are many subway stations next to it which make your trip easier (and cheaper). Considering the price you pay, you can not get a better place.

Reviews.Title: “Lovely small hotel in the wonderful location”
Reviews.Author: JohnelnWeldon
Reviews.Content: This hotel is a little gem - very nice small hotel in a really brilliant location!. The rooms were small - but that is what you can expect in Paris. The bedroom was very clean and the bathroom was recently renovated to a very high standard. I woul recommend this hotel without hesitation.

Reviews.Title: “Buget Hotel”
Reviews.Author: rush459
Reviews.Content: Lets be realistic the price for a room in this hotel is cheap,ok the rooms are a bit small, but they are extremely clean and well maintained. The staff are fantastic and very friendy. Its in a wnderful area of Paris, only 2 mins from the arch de triumph, and has loads of fantastic, and good value restaurants, although be prepared to wander of the main drag for these. So Paris on a budget ,then this is the place for you. Oh and free wi-fi in the room.

Reviews.Title: “Cool place in the best area of Paris”
Reviews.Author: jujudov
Reviews.Content: Comming from Israel with friends we had a pleasant stay at Elysee Etoile. Rooms are very clan, people are welcoming and the prices are really OK for the neighborhood (near the Arc de Triomphe). I highly recommand the place and I will definitely come back. Cheers !!

Reviews.Title: “Great weekend in Paris”
Reviews.Author: sheenamacdon
Reviews.Content: We loved this hotel. It was very convenient for all transport, but also central for walking. It was clean, comfortable and the staff were very pleasant. I would certainly stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “Hotel Elysee Etoile has BEDBUGS! It is Awful!”
Reviews.Author: Silvap1
Reviews.Content: STAY AWAY! Hotel Elysee Etoile is terrible. The hotel was infested with BEDBUGS. The hotel staff was very unfriendly when confronted with the situation. My colleague's bed was covered with bugs. My own bed, two floors down, had old blood stains on the pillow covers and sheets. Apart from the bugs, the room itself was very small with poor lighting. The owner was a real witch. There are many nicer hotels in the area! After discovering the bugs and fighting with the staff, we walked across the street to Hotel Elysee Ceramic, and although they were fully booked the staff took the time to help us find another hotel and gave us detailed instructions. They were so friendly and the lobby of the hotel was beautiful. I will definitely check out this hotel on my next trip to Paris.

Reviews.Title: “Hotel Elysee-Etoile, your home away from home”
Reviews.Author: robdezzotti
Reviews.Content: Great location, friendly staff. Price was really affordable compared to all other hotels in the same level category. Room was really clean and the bathroom seemed to be recently renovated. Room was small but this is notorius in France. Room enough to accommodate two people normally. Few steps away from the Arc of Triumph and very close to the metro station, besides bus stops connecting to all tour destinations. The hotel is located in a very small street, very calm. Free Internet Access offered. I had a pleasant staying and highly recommend this hotel for your staying in Paris. This is a two star hotel with a warm and friendly management.

Reviews.Title: “Terrible and unkind service!!”
Reviews.Author: ZW
Reviews.Content: We booked this hotel on france-hotel-guide a week before arriving at Paris. Upon arriving at the Paris airport, we even reconfirm with the receptionist about our reservation. However, when we went to the hotel, the receptionist said our rooms would not be available!! She explained that her colleague (the person who answered our phone call earlier) was oblivious of the "real vacancy". We were 2 girls touring Paris for the first time and urged the receptionist for an appropriate arrangement, to which she replied rudely: "I've already apologised. You just don't understand madam." In the end, the receptionist took us to another hotel 1 street further, and caused us so much inconvenience!! I highly recommend people to STAY AWAY FROM THIS HOTEL!!!

Reviews.Title: “Paris Basic”
Reviews.Author: LisburnMember
Reviews.Content: Clean hotel and very good location with limited hot water depending when you wanted a shower. Room was like a matchbox - with two people you had to plan who was going to move where and when, but certainly not at the same time! Very narrow stairs and the smallest floor space in the hallway that I ever seen - difficulty fitting 1 person + luggage in it. Certainly wouldn't like to have to exit this hotel in a hurry never mind an emergency. Breakfast room was an extension of reception and served very basic continental style. This was a 2* hotel and you definitely didn't get any more than that, not even from staff who were only interested in arranging trips.

HotelInfo.Name: Hotel Elysee Etoile
HotelInfo.Address: 5, rue de l'Etoile | 17 Arr., 75017 Paris, France
